content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is 800 Euros. This is a fair price for the location and the condition of the apartment. Is this a price that works for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 800 Euros. I am a student and I am very responsible, so I want to negotiate a lower price. Can you please lower the price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this apartment. However, I am willing to consider your request for a lower price. Based on your responsibility as a student, I am willing to lower the monthly rental price to 750 Euros. Is this a price that works for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 750 Euros. Thank you for your understanding.

I want to ask one more thing. Can I have a discount for 6 months?

I am very responsible, I want to prove it to you. I will pay the rent on time every month and I will take good care of the apartment. I am sure that I will be a good tenant for you.

I understand that you may have some concerns about my responsibility, but I assure you that I will be a reliable tenant. I will sign a lease agreement and I will pay the rent on time every month. I will also maintain the apartment in good condition and I will not cause any damage to the property. I will also inform you in advance if I need to make any repairs or if I need to move out. I hope that this will help you to trust me as a tenant.

I am very grateful for your understanding and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me. Thank you very much for your time and for your help.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your understanding and your willingness to be a responsible tenant. Based on your proposal, I am willing to offer you a discount of 10% for the first 6 months of your tenancy. This brings the monthly rental price down to 675 Euros. I trust that you will fulfill your responsibilities as a tenant and maintain the apartment in good condition. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
